content: chain work 2 double_crochet in ea double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 do not turn 24 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 double_crochet in same st at base of beg chain double_crochet in next double_crochet *2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 do not turn 36 double_crochet round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in ea double_crochet around repeat from * around join with slip_stitch do not turn 36 double_crochet round 5 chain 3 double_crochet in ea of next 3 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 *double_crochet in ea of next 4 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 do not turn 6 chain-2 sps 2 round 6 chain 6 counts as first double_crochet and chain-2 space skip 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet *2 double_crochet in space double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around ending with 2 double_crochet in last space join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of beg chain-6 do not turn 6 chain-2 sps round 7 chain 3 *2 double_crochet in space double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around ending last repeat with slip_stitch in top of beg chain-3 do not turn 6 chain-2 sps round 8 chain 1 single_crochet in ea st & space around working single_crochet in ea double_crochet & 2 single_crochet in ea space join with slip_stitch 36 single_crochet fasten_off mc round 9 join cc in any single_crochet on round 8 *chain 3 double_crochet in same single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch fasten_off cc and weave in tails ------------------------------------ clarification on chart below space = open block should read chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet there should be 2 double_crochet at beg of row 3 beg chain-3 counts as first double_crochet and 3 double_crochet at the end the first double_crochet of the 3 at the end is part of the preceding open block of chain-2 skip 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet on row 3 after the last 3-double_crochet solid block is worked you will skip 2 double_crochet then work 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet to complete the open block then work 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet and 1 double_crochet in top of turning chain equaling 3 double_crochet at the end of row row 3 of the chart is a bit unclear because the extra double_crochet that are part of the open blocks are not shown apologies for the less-than-wonderful chart it was made several years ago so the graphics are not the best the number of double_crochet at each end of each row will vary from row to row once you get it set up it should be easier to follow blocks & spaces row 4 6 at beg 5 at end row 5 5 at beg 6
